projects.title: MANDTRA RESIDENCES
projects.description: Mandtra Residences sets the standard of Cebuano Living at the heart of its industrial heritage.

projects.title: URBAN DECA HOMES
projects.description: Enjoy urban living within the business district of Mandaue City. Homeowners have close and easy access to malls, universities, churches, a hospital, international airport, as well as business and commercial districts in the metro.

projects.title: PRIMEWORLD DISTRICT
projects.description: At Primeworld District, residents donâ€™t have to leave home to enjoy summer activities. Facilities to match any premium resort are found on the amenity area, promising outdoor fun all year round.

projects.title: Le Menda-Busay
projects.description: Le Menda Residences is a luxurious residential development located in Busay, Cebu, Philippines. Situated in the picturesque mountains of Cebu, it offers residents breathtaking views of the city skyline and the surrounding natural beauty.

projects.title: PRIMEWORLD POINTE LAHUG
projects.description: Primeworld believes that every Filipino deserves a good life, starting with a good home. We have made it our mission to develop quality homes in safe communities where Filipinos can thrive and live a good life.

projects.title: CLARENDON RESIDENCES CEBU CITY
projects.description: Clarendon Residences in Cebu City!! Embracing Modern and Sophisticated lifestyle!

projects.title: NORTH GROVE AT PRISTINA TOWN
projects.description: The development features two distinctive towers, Lumina and Terra, thoughtfully crafted to blend harmoniously with the natural surroundings. These towers symbolize the balance between contrasts, creating living spaces where diverse lifestyles can coexist and thrive.

projects.title: TIERRA ALTA in SAN FERNANDO, CEBU
projects.description: Tierra Altais a new hot spot where new Dream Home is located. Embraced wide range of greenies, breathtaking mountain side & Seaview.

projects.title: GUADA VERDE RESIDENCES in GUADALUPE
projects.description: Guada Verde Residences is a place you can come home to and experience good life at Sterling land. Experience  verdant suburban lifestyle in the heart of the inner city, GET YOUR  VERDANT SUBURBAN LIFESTYLE HOME.

projects.title: PLUMERA CONDOMINIUM in Lapu lapu City
projects.description: Plumera Condominium is a walk-up condo located in Mactan. It is the newest project by Johndorf Ventures.

projects.title: DANARRA NORTH LILOAN CEBU HOUSE AND LOT
projects.description: Why choose DANARRA NORTH? It is situated just a few minutes’ walk from the national road and boasts an elevated, flat terrain that offers a breezy ambiance all year round. The property is flood-free and comes from a trustworthy developer.

projects.title: MACTAN PLAINS RESIDENCES
projects.description: Mactan Plains Residences is just a few meters away from Sto. nino Mactan Parish Church and the different office towers, shopping centers, grocery, and retail shops in Mactan Newtown.

projects.title: BREEZA COVES MACTAN PHASE 2
projects.description: Part of the series of Breeza communities in Mactan, Breeza Coves is one of the second projects under this umbrella. It sits on a 1.36- hectare lot in Barangay Babag, Lapu-Lapu City. Upholding its brand of offering a low-density community, the residential community will have homes that are designed to be bigger than the first Breeza project.

projects.title: ARC TOWER RESIDENCES
projects.description: Arc Tower Residences is a project that will have residential condo, office and hotel components – will rise at N. Bacalso Avenue corner V. Rama Street in Cebu City.

projects.title: MINGLANILLA HIGHLANDS PHASE 1 & 2
projects.description: A place you can call home where everything you need is in one place.

projects.title: BALAI BY BE RESIDENCES
projects.description: Balai by Be Residences in Punta Engano is a Seaside Living for Everyone. It is a 19-storey residential resort situated along the high-end resorts in Punta Engano, Mactan.

projects.title: CITYSCAPE GRAND TOWER
projects.description: Cityscape Grand Tower is a 34-storey residential condominium with ultimate amenities designed to deliver comfort, convenience and satisfaction.

projects.title: CASA MIRA SOUTH NAGA CITY, CEBU
projects.description: Awarded as 2018 s Best Housing Development in Cebu, this beautifully designed economic community sits on a rolling terrain 60 to 100 meters above sea level that boasts expansive views and 45% open spaces.

projects.title: CASA MIRA TOWERS MANDAUE
projects.description: Casa Mira Towers Mandaue is a 4 high-rise residential condominium development that sits in one of Cebu major cities. The development offers resort like amenities, thus will offer MORE to the economic market.

projects.title: 128 Nivel Hills
projects.description: Choose from a selection of spacious and elegantly designed unit types to suit your lifestyle needs, including the cozy Studio Unit, the luxurious 2 Bedroom with Maids Room, the sprawling 3 Bedroom with Maids Room, and the grand 4 Bedroom with Maids Room condo for sale.

projects.title: Mivela Garden Residences
projects.description: The 6th addition to Cebu Landmasters Best-Selling Garden Series, this development is poised to blossom into a modern garden residential community in Cebu City, set to redefine the concept of garden living.

projects.title: Amani Grand Resort Residences
projects.description: Amani Grand Resort Residences blends Cebu vibrant cultural heritage with its dynamic modernity. Enjoy a tranquil retreat in thoughtfully designed living spaces that prioritize comfort, happiness, and well-being.

projects.title: ROYAL OCEANCREST MACTAN
projects.description: Designed to be the getaway of your dreams  a haven for you to relax and reconnect with yourself and your loved ones.

projects.title: TURNBERRY PLACE 2 , LAPU-LAPU CITY
projects.description: Turnberry Place 2: pre-selling townhouses in Mactan We have few units left. It’s 3 minutes drive to Mactan International Airport.

projects.title: Royal Oceancrest Panglao
projects.description: Imagine a life surrounded by pristine white sand beaches, crystal-clear waters, and lush tropical scenery—all just steps from your doorstep.

projects.title: ALBERLYN BOXHILL RESIDENCES
projects.description: Alberlyn Box Hill Residences offers a vision of refined living at an accessible price. While both feature the same style of Asian contemporary homes, they stand out by providing elegant yet affordable housing options.

projects.title: HARRINGTON PLACE POOC
projects.description: A brand that merges quality housing—an idyllic experience where your dreams of homeownership come true—with affordability.
